text: Crassispira erronea is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pseudomelatomidae, the turrids and allies.MNHN, Paris: Drilla (Crassispira) erronea ==Description== ==Distribution== Fossils have been found in Eocene strata in Loire Atlantique, France. ==References== * Cossmann (M.), 1902 - Mollusques éocèniques de la Loire-Inférieure. tome 2, fascicule 2. Bulletin de la Société des Sciences naturelles de l'Ouest de la France, sér. 2, t. 2 , vol. 1, p. 5-159 erronea Category:Gastropods described in 1902
title: Crassispira erronea
